topProducts.name: Vegan Pizza
topProducts.description: A popular pizza option, frequently cited as being among the best in the city. Made with vegan cheese and available with various toppings.
quotes: I’ve been getting a vegan pizza Bianca from Galactic since high school and recently started branching out- everything is just as good
They have outstanding stuff and their vegan pizza is amazing
Not the best vegan pizza in the Midwest

topProducts.name: Pizza Crust
topProducts.description: The pizza base, often described as great and crispy, with a New York style quality. However, some reviews mention it can be inconsistent, occasionally being tough or cracker-like.
quotes: They offer the best gluten free pizza crust I’ve ever had

topProducts.name: Pasta
topProducts.description: A highly-rated dish, with one review calling it the 'absolute best'. There is a creamy vodka sauce pasta, though one diner had a poor experience with it.
quotes: this is the absolute best pasta and pizza i have had at a restaurant
The food wasn’t as described I had got the creamy vodka sauce pasta and it was just come chunks of tomato with melted cheese and the pizza tasted like cardboard
Un lugar tranquilo, tienen muchas opciones de pizza y pasta

topProducts.name: Cheese Sticks
topProducts.description: House-made and not greasy, considered a must-get item. Also referred to as 'breadsticks', though one review described them negatively as a baguette with cheese.
quotes: In addition get the cheese sticks, house made and not greasy at all
Their cheese sticks live up to the hype

topProducts.name: Paul Bunyon Pizza
topProducts.description: A specialty pizza made with all local ingredients.
quotes: I got wings and a Paul Bunyon pizza, made with all local ingredients

topProducts.name: The Shroomer Pizza
topProducts.description: A specific pizza variety that was highly praised by a customer.

topProducts.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
topProducts.description: Described as the 'best I've ever had' by a repeat customer.
quotes: Best spinach artichoke dip I’ve ever had and the cheesecake is beyond as well

topProducts.name: Cheesecake
topProducts.description: A dessert item described as 'beyond as well' in quality.
quotes: Best spinach artichoke dip I’ve ever had and the cheesecake is beyond as well
We ordered a large Paul Bunyan, raspberry cheesecake and chocolate chip cookies
Muddy Paws cheesecakes and Cookie Cart desserts available

highlightedReviews.author: Brittany Jiménez
highlightedReviews.text:
Galactic Pizza is delicious! We really love the Paul Bunyan pizza, made with toppings native to MN. The Thailander is another favorite of ours. They have unique and tasty specialty pizzas, many of which can be made vegan or are vegan. We haven't tried their pasta, apps, or salads, but we did thoroughly enjoy the strawberry vegan cheesecake.
Pizza Luce is the popular local pizza joint, but after going to Galatic, we are definitely switching over to Galatic. Vegan cheese option, crust is sturdier so everything stays on when you pick up the slice, unique flavor combos, and friendly service. Can't recommend enough. Wish more people would go here so we can make sure it stays in business.

highlightedReviews.author: Zack Virgo
highlightedReviews.text: My wife and I were visiting from our of town, and we eat..probably more than our fair share of pizza. We stopped in because we saw the pictures online and thought it looked fun. So glad we stopped. I got wings and a Paul Bunyon pizza, made with all local ingredients. My wife got just cheese. Everything we ate was spectacular and the service was so friendly and top notch. Next time we happen to be in the Twin Cities we are definitely coming back

highlightedReviews.author: Cami
highlightedReviews.text: This place has the nicest owner that served us. He was kind, and helpful. I highly recommend getting a bunch of 10 inch smaller pizzas and then sharing so you can try out a few of the unique ones. The chicken wings are a bit small so I recommend upgrading to the full plate. Nice to have the option of baking them though. Food was good, but the crust was a bit thin for my personal preference. I recommend this place for a new pizza flavor.

highlightedReviews.author: Gaige Steele
highlightedReviews.text: this is the absolute best pasta and pizza i have had at a restaurant. there are tons of gluten-free, vegetarian, and vegan options. John really seems to care about his quality of food, and it shows. i got the pasta, and my girlfriend got the pizza, and we were both snagging bites from each other with how good it was. When i come back to Minnesota, this is a must stop.

highlightedReviews.author: Todd Jelinski
highlightedReviews.text: Awesome experience!! Not sure why we were the only ones there, but it was a summer Saturday afternoon. As the only ones in the restaurant we were spoiled by the great service!! Nice personal touch explaining some history of the restaurant along with the menu and emphasizing local ingredients. One in our party is gluten free and most everything on their menu has a gluten free option, which was so nice. We tried a Brooklyn Bee (my favorite), a Paul Bunyon(which is so Minnesotan and so very, very good), and a Shroomer (which was also good). Enjoyed a Lift Bridge Rootbeer, which was so smooth and creamy. And as it was my birthday they have me a choice of dessert and I chose the gluten free marble cheesecake with raspberry sauce, which was so good and from a nearby local bakery. Such a nice touch with the free birthday treat. The restaurant also has a great vibe and atmosphere, something you would expect from a local pizza shop. Such an awesome experience, great food, and fantastic service!! Highly recommend!!

highlightedReviews.author: danielle spinozzi
highlightedReviews.text: Coming from Chicago I'm a bit of a pizza snob, so wasn't expecting much from Galactic Pizza when I stopped in during vacation. WOW is all I can say, I was blown away with the super friendly service, the cute location and most of all the pizza. The san marzano pizza sauce is house made and a 10 out of 10. One if the best pizzas I've ever had. In addition get the cheese sticks, house made and not greasy at all. Wish Galactic was closer to home because this pizza is damn near perfect.

highlightedReviews.author: Ashley Green
highlightedReviews.text:
They offer the best gluten free pizza crust I’ve ever had. Last year, I learned I can’t eat gluten anymore and it’s been really difficult finding restaurants that are both accommodating and put just as much love and energy into their GF options. Galactic does both.

They have a wide variety of options for everyone and that’s so rare and refreshing.

Ingredients taste fresh and it’s just great quality, yummy food that anyone can enjoy! The world needs more of this lol!

I also have quite a few strictly vegan family members and it’s so good to be able to order truly fantastic pizza for everyone’s needs. Their Second Harvest Heartland is my favorite.

highlightedReviews.author: Jason Buchanan
highlightedReviews.text:
Vegetarian, Vegan, GF options for almost every pizza!

very friendly staff, and a very inviting environment. it feels nice and campy, this space travel decor and the extravagant-but-not-pretentious seating, wall treatments and ceiling elements are all having a lot of fun, but aren't pretending to be something they aren't. staff is all very down to earth, and the pizzas use all natural ingredients wherever possible. lots of options for many dietary choices.

highlightedReviews.author: Patrick Gallagher
highlightedReviews.text: Inoffensive pizza is about all I can say for the pie, but they do generally have fresh ingredients that are pretty good, and they have some decent specialty pies. That being said, this place is under takeout strain, waited for our order for quite a bit and heard a seated table was waiting on DoorDash orders to clear before getting their food. Beware dining in during peak times.

highlightedReviews.author: Zach
highlightedReviews.text: Met a friend for lunch here. While it was empty for weekday lunch, the owner made us feel welcome and served us. Gave us suggestions on what to get and even brought back a free tasting of another pizza he was cooking up for himself. Friendly, good pizza, quality selection of drinks and food. Pizza reminded me of New York style. Expensive ($24ish for the pizza we got in the picture) but what restaurant eating out now isn’t?
